value.message:
Enhance LLM tie-breaking, summaries, and context awareness

- Use OpenAI to generate clarifying questions (text/enum/enum_list) for ties, considering known user traits
- Select winning outcome and generate personalized summary via LLM after clarifier answer
- Add FinalSummary to EvaluationResult and display it in completion responses
- Pass knownTraits to all question generation methods to avoid redundant questions
- Refactor RoutingEvaluator for LLM-based tie resolution and summary generation
- Update ConversationController to support dynamic clarifier traits and pass knownTraits
- Remove bundled JSON spec files; switch to external config paths in csproj and appsettings
- Improves user experience with more natural, context-aware explanations and tie resolution
value.author: Mark Hazleton

value.message:
Refactor: extract core logic to DecisionSpark.Core project

Moved all core models and services to new DecisionSpark.Core project for better separation of concerns and reusability. Updated main web project and tests to reference core types. Improved logging config and switched log/conversation paths to relative. No functional changes; enables use of core logic outside ASP.NET Core.

- Introduced SpecListResponse and SpecInfo models for managing available decision specs.

- Modified StartRequest to include optional spec_id for session initialization.
- Improved user input handling in the frontend to support dynamic question types and spec selection.
- Updated logging and error handling for better traceability.
- Adjusted response mapping to reflect new conversation flow and spec handling.
- Added new parsing methods in ITraitParser for improved input validation and extraction.
- Updated OpenAIQuestionGenerator to enforce structured selection for enum types.
- Enhanced UI to dynamically render input fields based on question type.

value.message:
Support multi-question input types & negative options

Implements full support for text, single-select, and multi-select questions with deterministic option IDs, negative option enforcement, and robust input normalization. Adds question type arbitration logic, validation history tracking, and telemetry for renderer selection and latency. Updates API/DTOs, OpenAPI spec, and UI components for new question types. Includes comprehensive unit and Playwright browser tests, plus telemetry dashboard and documentation. Satisfies FR-006, FR-024a/b, FR-033, FR-034a, FR-042, FR-043, FR-044, and SC-001 to SC-004.

value.message:
OpenAI integration: natural language parsing & questions

Major upgrade: added OpenAI/Azure OpenAI support for natural language parsing, question generation, and tie resolution. TraitParser now uses LLMs for parsing when regex fails; RoutingEvaluator generates clarifying questions via OpenAI. Improved model binding, logging, and emoji encoding. Updated spec and added comprehensive docs and restart script. System gracefully falls back when OpenAI is unavailable. **Restart required to apply changes.**
value.author: Mark Hazleton

value.message:
Fix JSON case, CORS, and add debug console & logging

- Make JSON deserialization case-insensitive to accept both snake_case and PascalCase (fixes "Could not find a number" error)
- Add aggressive backend logging and a custom model binder for NextRequest to trace deserialization
- Simplify API routes and generate URLs using the actual request host to fix CORS issues
- Add a comprehensive debug console to the web UI for real-time API request/response logging and troubleshooting
- Provide browser cache and troubleshooting documentation to ensure latest JS is loaded and issues are easily diagnosed

Add Web UI and enhance API testing capabilities

Integrated Serilog for structured logging and added MVC support with Razor views. Enhanced Swagger configuration with API key authentication and XML comments. Updated routing to support static files and MVC, moving Swagger UI to `/swagger`.

Implemented a complete Web UI with three views (`Index`, `Demo`, `About`) for API testing, featuring real-time conversation flow, pre-built scenarios, and HATEOAS navigation. Designed a responsive, modern UI using Bootstrap 5 with custom animations and styles.

Added comprehensive documentation (`QUICK_START_WEB_UI.md`, `WEB_UI_DOCUMENTATION.md`, `WEB_UI_SUMMARY.md`) covering setup, usage, and deployment. Ensured production readiness with API key authentication, HTTPS, and responsive design.
